item.description:
Join us at Rich's house in Manchester for Texas Hold'em

I know a few of us will be learning how to play so maybe we can have a couple practice games in the beginning.. like 7:00 - 7:30 and then start the real games at 7:30 pm....

Prizes will be awarded for the winners..

Best overall hand

and maybe a couple other prizes we will decide later on...

Bring a Food Item and whatever you want to drink...
item.name: Texas Holdem
